reviewText: I found this video very poorly produced. As far as Aikijujitsu content? The entire content was all Karate, I saw about .01% of Aikijujitsu in this video. In my 33 years in Aikijujutsu growing up in Japan and Korea, I think this is the possibly worst video of Aikijujutsu I or my students have ever seen. Sorry, I would not reccomend this to anyone who wants to learn Aikijujitsu. Some Karate maybe.
Gerardo Cantore is great. This is a wonderful dvd. I really learned alot & highly recommend it.
